item.title: How to Set Up ProtonVPN Free with WireGuard on Arch Linux
item.description: In this guide, you’ll learn how to set up ProtonVPN Free using WireGuard on Arch Linux. We’ll also cover how to disable IPv6 to prevent potential IP leaks. Step 1: Install Required Packages First, install the necessary packages for WireGuard: sudo pacman -S wireguard-tools resolvconf Step 2: Access ProtonVPN Dashboard Log in to your ProtonVPN account via the ProtonVPN dashboard. Step 3: Download WireGuard Configuration Files Navigate to the Downloads section in your ProtonVPN dashboard.
